hero_subheading: Discover world-class dentistry in the heart of our city
about_text: I, Dr. Buxarov, have dedicated my life to creating healthy and beautiful smiles. With many years of experience and a passion for dentistry, I offer a personalized approach to each patient.

reviews_list.name: Anna K.
reviews_list.review: Excellent service! Dr. Buxarov is a true professional. Thank you so much for my new smile!

reviews_list.name: Ivan P.
reviews_list.review: A very attentive and careful doctor. The treatment was painless. I recommend him to everyone.

reviews_list.name: Maria S.
reviews_list.review: I was very afraid of dentists, but Dr. Buxarov changed my mind. Now I only go to him for dental work.

reviews_list.name: Alexey V.
reviews_list.review: Modern equipment and an excellent approach to children. My son is no longer afraid of dentists.

reviews_list.name: Elena M.
reviews_list.review: The professional teeth cleaning was top-notch. The result exceeded all expectations.

reviews_list.name: Dmitry N.
reviews_list.review: Thank you for the quality work and friendly attitude. I will recommend you to my friends.
